resources.string: Please fill in all mandatory fields.
Select the services which you wish to activate for your vehicle.
There are no services which can be activated as all services available for activation were already activated.
Information is missing which is required for the activation of some services. Would you now like to provide the missing data\?
Your vehicle was successfully linked. Now activate your services in order to receive full access to the functions of your vehicle.
Many thanks for your activation – we will now activate the services for your vehicle.
Your user profile is incomplete. Please complete your personal data in order to receive access to the functions of your vehicle.
Missing user data\nCreate a user profile
Please install a PDF-Reader in order to read the Terms of Use.
Do you really wish to reject the general user agreement for Mercedes me connect\? This will affect your activated services
Thank you for updating our terms of use
Not all terms of use were able to be accepted.
I agree to the following Terms and Conditions.
I want to activate all Mercedes me connect Services and I agree to the Terms and Conditions.

Pursuant to and for the effects of art. 1341 and 1342 of the Italian Civil Code I declare to specifically and expressly accept the following paragraphs: E1, J, L, M, O after having carefully read the content of the corresponding clauses in the document.
I agree to the usage of my data for product improvements.
I agree to the following Terms and Conditions.
End user license agreement for Nuance
Consent under data protection law for Nuance
Do you agree to the Mercedes me connect terms of use\?
Are you sure you want to exit the application\?
This app is not yet available in %1$s.
Have your vehicle linked by a Mercedes-Benz dealer near you.
At the moment this service is only available to customers who purchased a Mecredes-Benz A-Class, CLA, GLA, CLS, E-Class or S-Class from Sindelfingen, Rastatt or Kecskemét.
Use with multimedia system MBUX or as a Subuser.
The linking process of the vehicle is active. As a rule, this usually completes within an hour.
Choose your preferred way to pair your vehicle.
The access code was transferred to your vehicle. After starting the engine, it will be shown automatically in the display
1. Start the engine of your vehicle and turn on the vehicle display.
2. Make sure your vehicle has an online connection. There might be problems with the reception, for example in an underground car park.
3. After a brief moment, a verification code will be displayed. Please enter it in the input field below.
Your entry does not have %1$d characters.
Please enter your 17-digit vehicle identification number in order to generate the allocation code.
The vehicle identification code entered is invalid.

This vehicle is already paired to another user.
If you are the owner of this vehicle, please contact your Mercedes-Benz retailer to pair this vehicle.
If you are not the owner of this vehicle, please contact the current master user. He can invite you as a sub user of this vehicle.
Unfortunately your VIN cannot be found. Please check it again.
If you don\'t have the multimedia system MBUX feel free to start a call to the Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center via Info Call button on the roof control unit of your vehicle.
There are two ways to use the vehicle assignment via QR-Code. You can either use it with the multimedia system MBUX or to get access to a vehicle as a second user.
Not sure if you have the multimedia system MBUX inside your vehicle\?
1. In the on-screen menu of your vehicle, click on the \"Mercedes me Apps\" tile.
2. The QR-Code is displayed under the menu item \"Mercedes me”.
3. Scan the code with the camera of your Smartphone.
Alternatively, you can of course pair your vehicle with the help of your Mercedes-Benz retailer.
Alternatively, you can of course pair your vehicle with the help of your Mercedes-Benz retailer.
The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) is a 17-digit, unique number used to identify your vehicle. You can find it in your vehicle registration document or in the door frame of your vehicle.
The pairing of the vehicle was successful!
Please note that your vehicle has no Mercedes me connect telematic services.

Please initiate a call to the Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center using the Info call button in the overhead control panel of your vehicle. Inform the colleague there that you wish to activate your vehicle for Mercedes me connect.
Pair your vehicle now in order to use all available Mercedes me connect services.

This service is currently available for customers who have bought a Mercedes-Benz A-Class, CLA, GLA, CLS, E-Class or S-Class from Sindelfingen, Rastatt or Kecskemét.\n\nThe QR code can be found on the MBUX of your vehicle, underneath the Mercedes me tile. Please scan the QR code using the camera of your cell phone.
Your Mercedes me ID has been registered successfully!
The pairing of your vehicle was successful!
In order to enjoy the full scope of functionality which the app offers, you must first link your vehicle with your profile.
Your device configuration supports biometric ID. In future, would you like to use a biometric ID instead of your PIN code\?
In order for your to use %1$s to confirm vehicle functions in future, the PIN must be entered again.\nPlease enter your %1$d-digit PIN:
The app uses %1$s in order to confirm your identity.
You must register a finger print on your device in order to use your biometric ID.
Your device configuration does not support biometric ID.
You must secure your lock screen in order to use a biometric ID.
Your PIN code is no longer correct. Please confirm it again.
The security settings on your device have changed. Please confirm your identity again.
There is no location data available
Please first log in to your account
Location data could not be sent
There is no vehicle data available
You entered your PIN incorrectly %1$d times. As a result, your CiamID has been blocked for %1$s.
You entered your PIN incorrectly %1$d times.

Please note: If you change the country or region, the services you use may be deactivated. This occurs if the services offered and the applicable terms of use differ depending on the country or region. Simply activate the services in the new country or region under the \"Manage services\" option.
Select a PIN of your own in order to prevent unauthorized persons from using critical functions in your app
Please enter the new PIN in its entirety.
Please enter the old PIN in its entirety.
Please choose a different location or a different dealer name and try again.
To use this feature, you have to confirm the access to the camera.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Something went wrong. Please check your Internet connection.
This feature is not available on your device
To use this feature, you have to confirm the access to your photo library.
By pressing on \"Continue\", I confirm that I have read and understood the Mercedes me app end user license agreement. I acknowledge the data protection regulations.

By clicking \"Next\" I confirm that I have read and agree to the Mercedes me App End User License Agreement (EULA) and the additional terms for the usage of the new Mercedes me apps for testing purposes. I have noticed the Data Protection Provisions.
additional terms for the usage of the new Mercedes me apps for testing purposes
Mercedes me App End User License Agreement (EULA)
The authentication failed. Please try again.
Your TAN is not correct. Please validate your input.

The Mercedes me ID comprises either your personal cell phone number or your e-mail address. With your Mercedes me ID, you can register everywhere in the digital world of Mercedes-Benz. It provides you with access to all services, functions and platforms available in your home country.
Please enter a valid e-mail address or telephone number.
Your session expired. Please log in again.
Cell phone number or e-mail address
Please agree to all required terms.
Please read and accept the content explanations given below.
Agreement to the processing of personal information and location information Ts & Cs
This is a placeholder for a Ts & Cs text.
I consent to all the Collection & Use (including optional), Delegation (optional), and Overseas Transfer of Personal Information and Location Information Terms & Conditions.
This information determines which functions will be available in your vehicle in future.

I have read and agree to the CIAM terms of access and the Mercedes me ID terms of use from Daimler AG, as well as the Mercedes me app end user license agreement (EULA) and the data protection regulations.
Without your agreement, it is not possible to continue using the app.
On the basis of your language settings we have determined the following address country and language.
Mercedes me app end user license agreement (EULA)
Mercedes me ID terms of use from Daimler AG
Please enter your current PIN in order to confirm the change.
You have not yet created a PIN
The PIN is not correct. Please try again.
Please select at least one communication method.
If you remove your landline number, we will not be able to contact you. Do you want to change the communication preference to Email\?
You need to provide a valid address to get contacted postally.
You need to provide a valid e-mail address to get contacted by e-mail.
You need to provide a valid phone number to get contacted by phone.
You need to provide a valid mobile phone number to get contacted by SMS.
Your account is not complete, please complete the missing data now.
The account was not able to be deleted.
Do you really want to delete your account\?
The city entered does not contain enough characters.
The country or region entered does not contain enough characters.
The house number entered is invalid.
The ZIP code entered does not contain enough characters.
%1$s is too long. Maximum length is %1$d.
%1$s is too long or empty. Minimum length is %1$d.
Are you sure, you want to log out\?
This e-mail address is already in use!
This mobile number is already in use!

%1$s
Possibly you have already registered in the past and now accidentaly registered with another Mercedes me ID a second time\?
In this case please go back and log in with your existing Mercedes me ID (mobile phone number or e-mail address).
By clicking on “Create Account” I confirm that I have read the access conditions and the Mercedes me ID service conditions of Daimler AG and accept these.
Please select a country or a region
Your first name does not contain enough characters.
Your last name does not contain enough characters.
Your e-mail address does not contain enough characters.
Your cell phone number does not contain enough characters.
Your password does not contain enough characters.
Your first name contains an invalid character.
Your last name contains an invalid character.
Your country or your region is invalid.
The cell phone number already exists.
Your password must contain the following characters...
Your first name contains too many characters.
Your last name contains too many characters.
Your e-mail address contains too many characters.
Your cell phone number contains too many characters.
Registration was successful. Please log in.
We have sent you an e-mail.
We have sent you a text message.
The passwords entered do not match.
The password entered needs at least %1$s characters, of which at least one lower-case letter, one upper-case letter, one number and one special character.
Please fill in all mandatory fields.

The Mercedes me ID is your personal key with which you can log in anywhere within the Mercedes me world. The me ID provides you access to all of the services, functions and platforms available in your country.
Select a vehicle or activate its services.
To do so, use the vehicle button on the top right.
The vehicle was successfully added but the data was not able to be updated.
The vehicle was successfully deleted but the data was not able to be updated.
No license plate has been entered
Do you really wish to delete this vehicle\?
Please first link a vehicle in order to be able to use this function.
You can now select all free services to activate for your vehicle at once or select services individually.
Unfortunately, it is not possible for you to change the status of this service.
Not all pre-requisites for the activation of this service have been fulfilled.
Your choosen and all available services for your vehicle.
We still require a number of pieces of information from you in order to be able to activate this service.
You must acquire a valid license.
Your must acquire a valid license for the service \"%1$s\".
The license plate of your vehicle
The data of your Mercedes-Benz dealer
You need to accept terms of use.
You must confirm your e-mail address.
You must confirm your cell phone number.
In order to use all available Mercedes me connect services, further information is required for certain services. You can also add these in your personal settings at any time.
Required for e.g. remote door lock/unlock
Required for e.g. remote door lock/unlock
Required for the purchase of additional services
Please enable notifications in the system settings first.
Problems or suggestions\?\nFeel free to call us.
Your message must not be empty
Your message was sent. We will contact you soon
Make sure that all data on your document is fully visible, glare free and not blurred

In order to be able to subsequently use the Mercedes me connect services to the full, a person check is required for security reasons. You can either carry this out now or at a later time conveniently in the app using your identity documents or your passport.

In order to use all available Mercedes me connect services to their full extent, an identity check is required for security reasons. Without the identity check, certain services such as remote door lock and unlock cannot be used.
Please enter the PIN code which we have sent you by e-mail.
Please enter the PIN code which we have sent you by text message.
We have sent a %1$d-digit TAN-Code to %2$s for verification purposes. Please insert the TAN-Code.
Please verify the e-mail address you provided or make a request for a new verification code.
Please verify the phone number you provided or make a request for a new verification code.
Align your face with the frame and look straight into the camera. Your face will be captured automatically
Place your document within the frame until all 4 edges are aligned and it is captured automatically.
I have read the Terms of Use of Daimler AG and accept them. I have taken note of the privacy statement.
In order to authenticate through the app, you have to accept the Terms of Use of the Daimler AG.
Your document will now be checked. As soon as the activation is successful, you will receive a message.
